text: Humantra Hydration Stick (Berry Pomegranate): per serving 200 mg sodium, 200 mg potassium, 25 mg magnesium, 50 mg calcium, 0 g sugar, 10 kcal. Fortified with 100 mg vitamin C and 100 µg B12. Sugar-free, plant-based, marketed as hydrating 4× faster than water. Dubai price: AED 109.5 / 20-pack (AED 5.5 per stick, April 2025).
Nutrition block for Humantra Berry Pomegranate Stick: Sodium 200 mg, Potassium 200 mg, Magnesium 25 mg, Calcium 50 mg, Vitamin C 100 mg, B12 100 µg, 10 kcal per serving.
Humantra hydration sticks are marketed as hydrating 4× faster than water, being gut-friendly and supporting immune function.
Vitamin C → antioxidant / immunity boost. Vitamin B12 → energy. Magnesium → muscle function and hydration. Potassium and sodium → electrolyte balance.
Humantra is estimated to provide a 4–5× hydration boost versus plain water, with a mild energy effect if dehydrated. Ideal for daily replenishment.
Dubai price AED 109.5 for 20 sticks on Kibsons, checked April 2025. Works out to AED 5.5 per stick.
